#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\t",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
int f[15];
void solve()
{
	f[0]=1;
	for(int i=1;i<=14;i++)
	{
		f[i]=f[i-1]*7;
	}
}
int sept(int n)
{
	solve();
	int ans=0;
	int c=0;
	int i=0;
	while(1)
	{
		if(f[i]<=n)
		{
			i++;
		}
		else
		{
			break;
		}
	}
	//cout<<i<<endl;
		i--;
		int i1=i;
		int d[i+1];
		while(i>=0)
		{
			d[i]=n/f[i];
			n=n-(f[i]*d[i]);
			//cout<<d[i]<<endl;
			i--;
		}
		int r=0;
		for(i=i1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			r=r*10+d[i];
		}
		return r;
	}
	
	

int main()
{
	int t;
	while(1)
	{
		sc(t);
		if(t==-1)
		{
			return 0;
		}
		pf(sept(t));
	}
	return 0;
}
